title: Team "Mean Beans" Silver-Gold Elo is looking for all roles. LATE NIGHT TEAM
body:
Team "Mean Beans", a team that I just created will be recruiting for every role but top. This team will be primarily Flex ranked until we get used to one another and are able to confidently go into tournaments. Team Members will be required to play solo/duo, 5v5 as a group, also the occasional 3v3 Flex to get season rewards.
Our play times will be around 11pm - 2 am. 3 or 4 days a week, please be able to make it to that schedule.
Roles:
Top: Filled
Jungle: Open
Mid: Open
Adc: Open
Support: Open

Requirments:
Silver 4-Gold 2.
No raging.
Solid gameplay.
Ability to play during the night time.
Please main the role you apply for, if I go look up your op.gg and see that less than 75% of the champs and roles you play are not the role you signed up for then I will disqualify you
Must have Discord, voice communication will not always be mandatory, but make sure you are available and have a working mic with no background noise.

Please fill out the application, DO NOT FRIEND ME, This is serious, I do not want my friend list spammed cause your impatient, If I'm interested in your response you will hear from within a day. THANK YOU!!!!

IGN:
Season 6 Rank:
Current Rank:
Role(only one):
Favorite champions for your role:
Time Zone:
